text: Bushma () is a rural locality (a settlement) in Biryukovsky Selsoviet, Privolzhsky District, Astrakhan Oblast, Russia. The population was 262 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 6 km ESE from Nachalovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Privolzhsky District, Astrakhan Oblast
title: Bushma
